name: fleaoffice
description: Modern web-based office suite for Fleabox

scripts.build: npm run build:write && npm run build:agenda && npm run build:list && npm run build:show && npm run copy
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -R write/dist/write dist/ && cp -R agenda/dist/agenda dist/ && cp -R list/dist/list dist/ && cp -R show/dist/show dist/
scripts.clean: npm run clean:write && npm run clean:agenda && npm run clean:list && npm run clean:show && rm -rf dist
scripts.clean:agenda: cd agenda && npm run clean 2>/dev/null || rm -rf agenda/dist
scripts.clean:list: cd list && npm run clean 2>/dev/null || rm -rf list/dist
scripts.clean:show: cd show && npm run clean 2>/dev/null || rm -rf show/dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:write && npm run lint:agenda && npm run lint:list && npm run lint:show
